mapper.update:
update sys_resources
code = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
pcode = #{pcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
pcodes = #{pcodes,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
icon = #{icon,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

update sys_resources set code = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pcode = #{pcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pcodes = #{pcodes,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, icon = #{icon,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, url = #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, num = #{num,jdbcType=INTEGER}, levels = #{levels,jdbcType=INTEGER}, is_menu = #{isMenu,jdbcType=INTEGER}, tips = #{tips,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, is_open = #{isOpen,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
select res.id,res.code,res.name,res.icon,res.url,res.levels,res.is_open isOpen FROM sys_resources res
LEFT JOIN sys_resources_pkg rela ON res.id = rela.resources_id
rela.user_id = #{userId}
and res.pcode = '0'
ORDER BY num
